#How to build iJab 0.1.7 from source.

iJab is written by Javascript.

1.Dependency:
  * Extjs & Ext GWT 1.1.x recomended [http://extjs.com/deploy/gxt-1.1.4.zip 1.1.4] (not compatible with 1.2 or later)
  * GWT 1.5.x
  * GWT voices
  * JsJac

2.Get source file
  using svn to get iJab source files.
  svn checkout http://ijab.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ ijab-read-only

3.Build iJab
  
  iJab provieds an Eclipse project file and using Eclipse to build this project.

  Please visit [http://code.google.com/webtoolkit/ Google Web Toolkit] for more information.
